p: Many individuals who initiated PrEP stopped the drug and later restarted. Among 2693 participants seen in follow-up, 2205 (82%) stopped PrEP at least once; 1096 (50%) restarted by week 72. Among participants who restarted, 201 (18%) stopped and restarted more than once and the median time off PrEP was 68 days (IQR 37â€“188). HIV testing was done at 4274 (83%) of 5140 visits where participants had stopped PrEP before the visit or did not receive a refill.
